Ok... working through the network stack.
I have found one item I can send back to get a refund from Amazon for $170. I’ll try and do that this week. The other thing busted is our connect. I
will need to replace that but have found a used on Amazon.
Just want to give you a heads up. The choice is to not use probably 8-10k in old stuff we already own, or upgrade everything and get 30% off through
Sonos. So I’m erring on the side of $370 vs $7,000
Other Sonos stuff I’d like to put into use:
• Sonos sub (was there on moving day)
• Mailbox Sonos speaker
• Side yard Sonos speakers
We could knock this out in about 30 minutes, a ladder, and a hammer, I would guess. BTW - I always kept the key IN the mailbox on purpose. Is that
